defining_moments.title: Overcoming Stage Fright at Debate
defining_moments.description: I froze during my first debate competition, forgetting my arguments. This experience taught me to embrace vulnerability and practice resilience in public speaking.

defining_moments.title: Rebuilding After a Science Fair Failure
defining_moments.description: My science project malfunctioned during the fair, leading to an unexpected failure. I learned the importance of troubleshooting and perseverance in the face of technical difficulties.

defining_moments.title: Navigating Team Conflict in Robotics
defining_moments.description: Our robotics team faced internal conflicts that threatened our project. By mediating discussions, I learned the value of communication and collaboration.

model_extra.essay_prompt: Tell me about a time you faced a challenge, setback, or failure. How did it affect you, and what did you learn from the experience?

essay_prompt: Tell me about a time you faced a challenge, setback, or failure. How did it affect you, and what did you learn from the experience?
